answers.answer: Wow that is very scary! I have never experienced that but I am assuming they will list you high risk and monitor you very closely this pregnancy. I do know women that had pre-eclampsia one pregnancy and not the next though, so that's good. Best of luck and try not to stress.
Im very nervous! But thank you. Good luck to you to!

question: With my first child i had preeclampsia and my placenta abrupted. What are the chances of this happening again. Im very worried, i almost list my life and my little girl.
title: pre eclampsia
